When we start to write a blog we select a particular niche which is mandatory otherwise we shall be clueless where we might not end up anywhere. So after doing niche research, we need to check if the people are looking for that niche or not. So here comes the Google Trends which shows that how much percent of the people actually looking for that particular niche. Basically it is a tool provided by google to check whether people are looking for that niche or not. If you want to write about Zumba and there is no people looking for that kind of article then that is a total waste of time and money. Look for that kind of niche which you are interested and people actually for that kind of niche.
